## Trying Cursor AI Now

I started using an IDE called **Cursor AI**, which is a fork of VS Code built for LLM workflows. Itâ€™s been bitter-sweet so far. It can track multiple files at once and reason across them, which is something Xcode + ChatGPT canâ€™t do. Although ChatGTP can be an agent for one file at a time in XCode, which is cool.

So now here is my workflow:

-   I keep **Xcode** open for previews and builds
